summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Finance Panel application. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend authentication, navigation, and CRUD operations working correctly with proper role-based access control. All core features functional.

design_issues.issue: Default user registration creates 'customer' role which has limited access. Users need admin/finance_team roles for full functionality
affected_screens: All pages except Dashboard, Subscriptions, Invoices

passed_tests: Backend API registration and login (100% success)
All CRUD operations (customers, subscriptions, invoices, expenses, rate tiers)
Frontend user registration and login flow
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider adding a way for users to request role upgrades or allow admin users to change user roles through the UI. Currently, full functionality requires admin/finance_team roles but registration defaults to 'customer' role.

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All features working, role-based access working as designed
